data.title: Jaime Goyarrola
data.text:
Jaime Goyarrola is a Venture Partner at Forgepoint, focused on our international efforts.

Jaime brings over 12 years of experience in finance, including leadership in M&A and fundraising processes for cybersecurity startups. He previously served as Finance Director for Constella Intelligence (a Forgepoint portfolio company) and prior to that served as CFO at Alto Analytics. Jaime began his career working for EY and PwC where he specialized in due diligence and valuation services.

Jaime holds a BBA from the University Francisco de Vitoria and a masterâ€™s degree in the Energy Business from the Spain Energy Institute. While not at the office, Jaime is a passionate golfer and loves traveling with his family.
